name: Rake Monster Hunter
summary: Rake Monster Hunter is FPS horror survival where you play as a brave hunter who looks for a deadly monster deep in the forest! The rumors that you heard were true. A lot of people got lost here. Some of them are found dead. The cause of death are strange wounds. You went to find the monster and kill it. In your arsenal you have small spy cameras, bear traps, hunting rifle, flashlight and all the stuff that might be useful. The goal is very easy - track and hunt down the creature. But remember, you may never return back home!
